casebody.data:
Charles ESPOSITO, Appellant, v. The UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 272. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 15, 1937. John A. Danaher, of Hartford, Conn., and Louis Sperandeo, of New Haven, Conn., for appellant. Robert P. Butler, U. S. Atty., of Hartford, Conn., and Arthur T. Gorman, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New Haven, Conn.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
